channel.title: Jailbreak Support
channel.description: Answers to all your Jailbreak questions and problems.

item.title: My eyePhone broke down... HELP!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (HugoMarques)
item.dc:creator: HugoMarques
item.content:encoded:
Hey, bitches! So, I just bought an iBrick because I'm a stupid Apple zombie that buys every overpriced piece of crap that company puts out... But I wanted more apps on it, because you buy a phone to cram it with apps, not call someone... Anyways, it has to be jailbroken, because apparently if you modify something you own, you're a criminal... Moving on, I tried jailbreaking the iWhatyoumacallit but the damn thing died on me...

I just registered on this forum really fast and didn't even read...

My eyePhone broke down... HELP!!!

item.title: Release Bug?
item.author: invalid@example.com (RaveniterX)
item.dc:creator: RaveniterX
item.content:encoded:
I just installed Jailbreak on my UT2004 and did some matches, but I found out that each time I try to release my team it says the jail release switch is jammed. I looked at the add-ons and it tells me it shouldn't be jammed.

How can I fix this?

item.title: How to install UT3 jailbreak
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheIronKnuckle)
item.dc:creator: TheIronKnuckle
item.content:encoded:
How to correctly install and play UT3 jailbreak

I've extracted to the correct folder as per the readme, and mapmixer has picked up the new maps (i know cause it's asking me to verify their details).

However the gametype does not show up in the gametype list. What do I have to do to make this happen?

item.title: Doors
item.author: invalid@example.com (Acid)
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.content:encoded:
I am literally new to mapping for jailbreak.

I learned by mocking the settings of other jb maps... Its functioning all except one thing

I cant get the door to work. It opens when you walk up to it but it doesnt open when the releasetrigger is activated.


If there is a link to a mappers introduction to jailbreak that would be awesome

item.title: JailBreak 2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xandora)
item.dc:creator: Xandora
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I am trying to host jailbreak server, but when players join the server they crash that dont have jailbreak installed. Is there something I am missing? I have this in the server packages;
ServerPackages=Jailbreak
ServerPackages=JBAddonAvenger
ServerPackages=JBAddonCelebration
ServerPackages=JBAddonJailFightTally
ServerPackages=JBAddonLlama
ServerPackages=JBAddonProtection
ServerPackages=JBAddonTeleport
ServerPackages=JBScreen
ServerPackages=JBToolbox
ServerPackages=JBToolbox2

item.title: A small bug list (UT3)
item.author: invalid@example.com (WGH)
item.dc:creator: WGH
item.content:encoded:
We've been playing Jailbreak III recently, and there were a lot of bugs. At the same time, Wormbo accindentally mentioned on IRC that JB is still being developed, so I'll post my small bug list here.

Unfortunately, only one bug has clear reproduction. All of them were encountered during online play.

1. Warmup is broken
If you join server with warmup enabled, once it ends, there will be an overtime round regardless of the score limit settings. Once this round ends, entire match...

A small bug list (UT3)

item.title: Update...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skillz)
item.dc:creator: Skillz
item.content:encoded:
My iPho.... just kidding guys.

Seriously though, some of the downloads at planetjailbreak.com for the original Jailbreak are linked to broken pages. Might want to update those links so they can direct new users to the correct location to download the files they seek.

I noticed it specifically with the map packs.

item.title: [Bug] upgrade to the previous version
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
Affected version: UT3JB-beta2, UT3JB-internal (latest)

This problem appears online when you join a server with an older version of the mod:
the client downloads the older version that overwrites the most recent.

Offline games becomes really unstable with mismatch versions of files.

There is a solution?

item.title: Biggest problem ever!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
I am bankrupt and I have cancer but this... this is the most problematic problem of my life!!



Why the hell there is no server for the internal version !?

jailbreak beta2 freeback

item.title: All humans jailed = security timer started!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
The idea is simple:

When all humans are in jails, a security timer begins (between 45s and 1min), when the timer has ended the round is finished.

If an human win an arena match during the timer, timer is stopped.
(or if an arena begins during it stops the timer)

If there is the same number of human in red jails and blue jails, it's a match null.


It avoids to wait foolishly 3/4 minutes (or more...) that the bots are unlocked or understand that they must come to save you...

All humans jailed = security timer started!

and less *** ****

Planet Jailbreak will REBORN !!!

item.title: Permission To Use
item.author: invalid@example.com (helred)
item.dc:creator: helred
item.content:encoded:
My friends and I rent a server for personal network games of Unreal 3. We'd really like to use UT3 Jailbreak. Is this something we can do. Or do we need to get permission to use it on our server.

Thanks.

item.title: Problem with addons in JailBreak 2004b
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neon_Knight)
item.dc:creator: Neon_Knight
item.content:encoded:
Hi!

I'm having a problem in Jailbreak 2004b. The addon tab shows no addons, even those which came with the mod.

The log (attached) doesn't show anything.

These are the addons I have in System. The UCL files for them weren't generated:

JBAddonAvenger
JBAddonCelebration
JBAddonLlama
JBAddonNoJailKill
JBAddonOvertimeLastChance
JBAddonProtection
JBAddonReleaseTree
JBAddonSpoils
JBAddonTeleport

I'm using Ubuntu 10.10 Maverick Meerkat.

Any idea on what the problem would be?

item.title: Jailbreak textures/decals pack for ut3 mapper?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
Have you planned to publish a textures/decals pack for the ut3 mappers?



Ive nocited that you had already published a pack for ut99: I think this was a good thing, no?
(it is encouraging, motivating, and attracts more mapper, It helps to have some quality maps too)

Can publish you one? Because any ressources are welcome.

item.title: graphic prob with JBteleporter
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
Situation:
-i use 2 JBteletporter (per jail) in output
-each teleporter has its own output
-in kismet there are a simple toggle action per jail
-bTeamSpecific on
-bEnabled off
-all teleporter work, but....

Problem:
-when a player release his team only 1 portal is visible on both

SOLVED by replacing each bugged actor (jbteleporter actor bugged after mirroring)

item.title: Challenge event (kismet)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
The idea is to create a new event who alternate with the arena fight event.
For example: a corridor "TombRaider style" full of test and obstacle, with aim to achieve the output before a time defined. (one corridor per player)

(the objective is not to replace the arena fight but offer more event in jail)
What do you think?

item.title: Jailbreak(UT3) announcer voices @!?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
The current voices are correct but remain below of those present in JB2k4,
These are the same phrases then why have them change?


It is also the point of view on many forum and unreal's fan.

item.title: Release switch floating (JB-beta2)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bloodyboy)
item.dc:creator: Bloodyboy
item.content:encoded:
It is only a visual prob but "release switch" always gives the impression of floating: impossible to paste it on a "static mesh".
I would like to understand. Thanks
